bibl.title: Four inscriptions from Marina/el-Alamein.
bibl.note: Polish Archaeological Mission and Polish-Egyptian Conservation Mission, 2001-2005. - 1. Honorific inscription, 15 November AD 129. - 2. Base of a statue (?), reign of Hadrian (?). - 3. Fragment concerning a bath, undated. - 4. Funerary inscription, 2nd-1st cent. B.C.
LAJTAR Adam, Four inscriptions from Marina/el-Alamein.
